      Constructor and Description
      BcHMAC(CryptographicHash hash)
      This constructor gets a SCAPI collision resistant hash to be the underlying hash and retrieves the name of the hash in order to create the related digest for the BC Hmac this class uses.

      This constructor gets a random and a SCAPI collision resistant hash to be the underlying hash and retrieves the name of the hash in order to create the related digest for the BC Hmac this class uses.
